full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA nI RIL SGRUB KYI CHO GA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @026B ZHES MA ni RIL SGRUB KYI CHO GA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, T'A BLA MA NGAG DBANG RIN CHEN DANG, DAR HAN CHOS RJE BSTAN 'DZIN SOGS KYIS GTZO BYAS DAD LDAN DU MAS ZHAL 'DEBS BYAS TE, GZHAN PHAN BYANG CHUB GLING GI 'DUS SDER LO RE BZHIN BSGRUB PA'I MA nI RIL BU'I SGRUB PA 'DZUGS PA'I TSE TSOGS 'DON DU MKHO BA CHA LAG TSANG BA'I CHO GA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG GYIS ZHES, BLA MA RNAMS DANG 'DUS SDE MANG PO BCAS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^RJE LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE DANG, ^BKA' 'GYUR PA NO MON HAN SOGS KYI GSUNG RAB DU MA DANG, PHYAG LEN MTHONG THOS SU GYUR BA RNAMS LA BRTEN, @027A *, ,'GA' ZHIG GSAR DU BZOS TE LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR SH'AKYA BTZUN TSUL KHRIMS KYIS BSGRIGS PA'I TSE YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BSAM GRUB NYI MA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN BDE RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm,, ,,
